Private Viewing

A handful of uncharted new pieces made on my return to The National Gallery after the final site launch rewarded me some long overdue concentrated drawing time.

Use the controls below to preview the drawings. *

Meditation App

Out in the main foyer balcony, uncannily still for over an hour.

* All the drawings are available for purchase. Please get in touch to enquire.

Subscriber Broadsheet

There's nothing quite like a physical broadsheet publication to get nearer to the original experience of a large drawing.

A number of years ago now, I discovered The Newspaper Club which allowed the dream of inexpensive reproduction of drawings to scale to become a reality.

Get the limited edition broadsheet for free when you buy your next drawing.

Giclée Series New for 2023

Coming in the new year, a series of small scale prints derived from popular and previously purchased drawings. Get in touch for more details.
